channel.title: Adding wild inside a safe zone?
channel.description:
ok so lets say i wanted to make a safe zone and i wanted to make a small area inside of it wild with out having to build a safe zone around it example: ok so you see the safe zone and inside theres a small box of wild
safe zone /--------------------------\ | | s | | a | wild | f | /---------\ | e | | | | | | | | z | \---------/ | o | | n \--------------------------/ e safe zone
i tried makeing a boolean but i dont where to add it (I added it under boolean nonwild() { ) [code]public boolean Wild() { if((absX >=3671 && absX <=3681 && absY >=3489 && absY <=3499 ) || heightLevel == 1) return false; else return true; }[/code] i made it from useing the nonwild boolean i just switched the falses and trues would i add wild(); to boolean process? if im totaly wrong please help me out

item.title: Adding wild inside a safe zone?
item.dc:creator: @openice123 openice123
item.description:
@openice123 wrote:

[quote=“wasabiie, post:6, topic:152935”]make each section individual.and leave the middle as wild, it might take a little while.

/--------------------------
| S | Safe | |
| | | S |
| | Safe | |
|---- /---------\ ----|
| | | |
| S | W | S |
| ---------/ |
| | S | |
------------------------[/quote]

thats what im not trying to do
i want to add a safe zone then make a wild zone inside of it

so theres 1 big safe zone then i add one small wild zone inside of the big safe zone

Read full topic

item.title: Adding wild inside a safe zone?
item.dc:creator: @openice123 openice123
item.description:
@openice123 wrote:

ok so lets say i wanted to make a safe zone and i wanted to make a small area inside of it wild with out having to build a safe zone around it

example:
ok so you see the safe zone and inside theres a small box of wild

safe zone /--------------------------\ | | s | | a | wild | f | /---------\ | e | | | | | | | | z | \---------/ | o | | n \--------------------------/ e safe zone

i tried makeing a boolean but i dont where to add it
(I added it under boolean nonwild() { )

public boolean Wild() { if((absX >=3671 && absX <=3681 && absY >=3489 && absY <=3499 ) || heightLevel == 1) return false; else return true; }

i made it from useing the nonwild boolean i just switched the falses and trues
would i add wild(); to boolean process?
if im totaly wrong please help me out
